name: PhilipsCoffee+
0:
”Alexa, tell coffee plus to turn my coffee machine on.”
”Alexa, tell coffee plus to power off the espresso machine.”
”Alexa, tell coffee plus to set coffee machine timer to 8:30 in the morning.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coffee plus
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Philips coffee skill lets you control the Philips Connected Fully Automatic Espresso Machines. 

To enable this skill: 
1. Install the Philips Coffee+ app from the Google Play Store or iOS App Store. 
2. Follow the on-screen instructions to connect your Philips Connected Espresso Machine to your phone. You’ll need to create or log in to your Philips online account. 
3. Enable the Philips Coffee+ skill in the Amazon Alexa app by tapping the button at the top of this screen and logging in to your Philips account. 

Examples:
Brew me a espresso.
Brew me a cup of coffee.
Make me a coffee.
Turn my coffee machine on.
Power off the espresso machine.
Set coffee machine timer to 8:30 in the morning.
Turn the espresso machine on at 9 AM.
Change my coffee machine’s timer to 10 AM.
Cancel the coffee machine’s timer.
Stop brewing
Stop making coffee

For additional support, please visit https://www.usa.philips.com/c-m-ho/coffee/support-for-coffee-machine
